content:
Welcome @BWPanda (Peter) as the newest Backdrop core committer! We've just finished the introductory meeting and he's merged his first issue (https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4209)!

Give block modules a chance to handle block removal from layouts (property/hook) 路 Issue #4209 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the need Currently there's no way for block modules to catch the removal of their blocks from layouts. This also affects core modules. Proposed solution After some experiments it...

And of course @BWPanda (Peter) has been active in the Backdrop community for years already. We're lucky to have such a thoughtful and intelligent person. Thanks so much @BWPanda (Peter) for taking on this new responsibility and for all you do!
congrats @BWPanda (Peter) (or condolences for all the new work that just landed on your shoulders, that'll teach ya to be all helpful and smart)
